title.rendered: Q&A with Lorien Barlow: How Alticor Inc Furthers Diversity & Women in the Workforce

content.rendered: Alticor Inc President and CEO, Michael Choutka, recently sat down with filmmaker and tradeswoman advocate, Lorien Barlow, to discuss company diversity and breaking down gender barriers in the construction trades. Having interviewed dozens of tradeswomen across the country for feature film, Hard Hatted Women, Barlow wanted to gain a unique perspective on the topic, reaching out to Alticor Inc, a construction general contractor well-known for their progressive practices. Together, Barlow and Choutka discuss the company’s mission, special programs, industry challenges and why Alticor Inc has earned Associated Builders and Contractors (ABC) National Diversity Excellence Award seven of the past eight years. Read Lorien and Mike’s full Q&A here.
